resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81191</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81191</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4240</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Using the Washing Machine</string>
            <string language="es">Utilización de la lavadora</string>
            <string language="ga">An tInneall Níocháin a úsáid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwenden der Waschmaschine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation de la machine à laver</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando a máquina de lavagem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per mezzo della lavatrice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίηση του πλυντηρίου ρούχων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This activity outlines the skills taught in preparing students for independent use of a household appliance. It is suitable for students in the Moderate / Mild Special Needs range.</string>
            <string language="es">Esta actividad describe las habilidades enseñadas para preparar a los estudiantes a que usen un electrodoméstico de forma independiente. Es adecuada para estudiantes con necesidades especiales moderadas/suaves</string>
            <string language="ga">Imlíníonn an ghníomhaíocht seo na scileanna a mhúintear chun daltaí a réiteach chun fearas tí a úsáid go neamhspleách. Tá sé feiliúnach do mhic léinn sa réimse Riachtanais Speisialta Bhoga/Mheasarthacha.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SPHE</string>
            <string language="es">SPHE</string>
            <string language="ga">OSPS</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Aktivität umreißt die Fähigkeiten, die 
wenn sie Kursteilnehmer für unabhängigen Gebrauch eines 
Haushaltsgerätes unterrichtet werden, vorbereitet. Es ist für 
Kursteilnehmer in der gemäßigten/milden speziellen Notwendigkeiten 
Strecke verwendbar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette activité trace les grandes lignes des 
qualifications enseignées en préparant des étudiants pour 
l'utilisation indépendante d'un appareil électroménager. Il 
convient aux étudiants dans chaîne spéciale modérée/douce des 
besoins.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta atividade esboça as habilidades ensinadas em
preparar estudantes para o uso independente de um dispositivo de casa.
É apropriado para estudantes escala especial moderada/suave das
necessidades.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa attività descrive le abilità insegnate 
nel preparare gli allievi per l'uso indipendente di un 
elettrodomestico. È adatto ad allievi gamma speciale 
moderata/delicata di bisogni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η δραστηριότητα περιγράφει τις δεξιότητες που 
διδάσκονται στην προετοιμασία των σπουδαστών για την ανεξάρτητη 
χρήση μιας οικιακής συσκευής. Είναι κατάλληλο για τους 
σπουδαστές στη μέτρια/ήπια ειδική σειρά αναγκών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
